charges.charge_disposition: Deft pled guilty to count 1-3 of Indictment; 18 mos imprisonment on each count to run concurrently; court recommends designation to minimum security facility near Wichita, KS; deft to self-surrender; 5 yrs supervised release on count 1; 3 yrs supervised release counts 2-3 to run concurrently with each other and count 1; special and standard conditions of supervision; $150 assessment; $88,029.79 restitution; statement of reasons as set forth (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:510(a)(1) &; (a)(2)-Forged endorsement or signature on US Treasury check with intent to defraud. INDICTMENT 4-17-97. (2-3)
